creator: umajava@gmail.com
text:
At this link http://archive.apache.org/dist/tomcat/tomcat-5/v5.0.28/bin/ When 
I try to download jakarta-tomcat-5.0.28.exe, I end up getting only 4.75 MB out 
of 10 MB file size.

Can you check this please?

5.0.x is no longer supported. There have been some fixes in recent 5.5.x
versions to support large (>2GB) downloads.
creator: markt@apache.org
len.popp@gmail.com
text:
(Note that this is about a problem with archive.apache.org, not a bug in Tomcat.)

I downloaded jakarta-tomcat-5.0.28.exe, and got the complete file with the
correct checksum. Try it again. Maybe try with a different browser, or from a
different network.

Sorry - my bad. I read the bug too fast. The link works fine for me too. Looks
like a cache issue somewhere between the OP and apache.
creator: markt@apache.org
